website_summaries.verdict: An excellent deal for a mop from a reputable and reliable company.
pros: Has a removable stainless steel spin chamber and also a splash guard
From a trusted name in the industry
cons: Some find the mop head too soft to tackle stuck-on grime and residue

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad writing this review. My friend has a mop just like this and I loved it. I thought I'd buy one for myself. It arrived shortly after I left the state so o couldn't use it right away. I used it twice so far and on my second use it broke. I undid the latch and placed the mop in the bucket, spun it a few times pulled it out. Latched it again and started mopping. Next thing I know something flys out and the handle no long locks. It's very upsetting. I had high hopes for this mop,it would make cleaning easier and now I am back to square one. I am very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nanceh

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: This item is not Made in USA, as advertised. It says right on the side of the box that it is made in China. The quality of the product is good, but I was disappointed because I paid a higher price, to buy an American made product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: is not even 2 months I bough this mop and the handle broke. I don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great absorbency and I love that the bucket is attached. The drying feature is also a wonderful addition!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: My mop broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My mop broke after 3 months of use (once a week). I bought this brand because it is supposed to be the best. Very disappointed in how long it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jania

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We love this mop. My son and daughter argue over who gets to use it. They've never mopped before. There is something about this mop that made them give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Makes mopping the floor easy and fun. Can spin to get just the wetness on the mop head just right.
customer_reviews.author: sam325

customer_reviews.title: Double check for all parts
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box I quickly noticed the mop head was missing. How can an essential part of what I purchased be missing? I was looking forward to finally mopping my floors again since my previous spin mop hurricane brand one broke but only after many year of use. Not thrilled with the Libman company and am returning it in exchange for a cedar brand spin mop.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Jones

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this mop
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mop because its save my time and I don't like to touch the mop. Good design. Only thing is I wish they can sell the handle separately so I won't need to buy the whole set if the handle part is broken. .
customer_reviews.author: MIN H.

customer_reviews.title: The best mop I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to use the mop is very much absorbent. Easy to clean. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Samantha G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.text: Not for deep cleaning but does the job better than anything I've seen for common use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Martin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS ITEM SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! So in love with this libman Mop and Bucket. No more lower back pain with the old way of doing things. This Mop helps with those who suffer from back issues.... Will buy another one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOP
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO STORE AWAY. EASY TO THROW AWAY THE WATER FROM THE BUCKET. THE HEAD DRIES EVERY WATER DROPLET. THE BUCKET DRAINS ALL THE WATER AWAY. THIS IS THE BEST MOP/ I BOUGHT ADDITIONAL FOR MY FAMILY MEMBERS.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until the metal basin that rings the water out of the mop started to rust, I was cleaning it and cut myself really deep ... had to get a Tetanus Vaccine.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mop. Easy to use and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Aamaraa

customer_reviews.title: No wringing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. High quality. Love that I don’t need to wring the mop!!!
customer_reviews.author: joan schofield

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this cheap product. The toggle switch broke after 4 uses. Totally useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Spring Cleaning Made Easier
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to assemble and use... would recommend
customer_reviews.author: darryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop
customer_reviews.text: Love it helps make cleaning a bit easier with my injured hand
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Expected it to last longer than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set on the 21st June 2019 and mop handle has already broke. No longer locks in place
customer_reviews.author: Elainereid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It definitely does an excellent clean and shine. Would definitely buy another. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, easy, doesn’t over dampen laminate floor, mop head washer friendly, a must have
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a month until the latch broke. I’m very disappointed with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Like if theycan fix the problem
customer_reviews.text: The clip on the handle to lock it broke only 6 months old
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Like the mop and bucket but the mop is frustrating and keeps scratching my floor . Not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: angie treadway

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke first time we filled and lifted to floor....Really cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product I have been using it for month and it last
customer_reviews.author: Rosy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love not having to get my hands wet when rising the mop. Also very easy to spin the mop.
customer_reviews.author: David Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This mop is just the best spin mop ... I love it!!! Thank you soo much for making a great product for our families...
customer_reviews.author: Clemen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product - easy to use and it works well
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kehl

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble and lots of work to spin! You have to manually unlock and re-lock the handle each time you spin the mop. The spinner is too small for the mop head and can splash water if you are not careful. Stainless spinner basket is nice but bucket appears to be cheap plastic and unit is made in China although their slogan is family made... Nice mop head but not worth the trouble to spin.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is a great concept, but started to rust after a month of using. Unless you have wood or aluminum floors, this mop is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn in KC

customer_reviews.title: Mop head is machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Mop refills are easy to find
customer_reviews.author: Reed moody

customer_reviews.title: Broke Too Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The moveable handle broke the first week. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is BS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stick for the mop didnt even come in the box what the hell is that about
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gauthier Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Must unlock handle every time you want to wring.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this product. The mop head is good quality, but the spinning mechanism is actually part of the handle. You have to unlock the handle every time you want to wring it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: I like that I don’t have to wring out the mop ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don’t have to wring out the mop by hand. The spin bucket works great! I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: You have to flip the lever on the handle to make it spin.
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to make the mop spin, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Somebodys Treasure

customer_reviews.title: After reading reviews for 90 minutes....(And made in USA!)
customer_reviews.text: After a really long expenditure of time, I landed on this. Libman, made in America, a name I can trust and seems to be the one with the best consistent reviews. Plus I know I'll be able to buy replacement mops locally if needed, and it felt good to buy something American Made! Thank you Libman! Made in Elma, New York! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Julie Julie Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop and mop head, bucket not so great
customer_reviews.text: The mop itself is excellent, the mop head is the best I have ever used. Cleans wonderfully. The downside is the spin portion, though it works well, the design was not thoroughly executed. When you remove mop to spin, the mop head has to be placed in spin portion ‘just so’ and leads to puddles of water on the floor. The bucket when carried is not balanced with the spin element in it. Better to be slid across the floor other then carried.
customer_reviews.author: CGray

customer_reviews.title: A Better Spin Mop
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement to the red “as seen on tv” Spin Mop from WM that my wife insisted on. The previous one felt cheaply made, and sure enough the handle broke within a few uses, the spinning mechanism was problematic and inconsistent, and the materials seemed cheap and fragile in general. But this one is far superior in appearance and feel. I feel like this one will hold up much better, and my wife agrees.
customer_reviews.author: RD Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the best spin mops I’ve used. The only drawback is the Spin bucket could be just a bit larger to accommodate the very generous mop size.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I had another that had a foot pedal and I thought this one was ok. For the price it was a good deal. The regular cloth strip mops seem better to me than this, but i own it now so.
customer_reviews.author: AWil

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Bought this because my customer had a similar one- the cedar o mop that has has foot pedal on the bucket to spin. This one isn’t as easy to use. Too many steps.
customer_reviews.author: Htodd

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mop I have ordered. On both mop handles the clip has broken that holds mop in place !
customer_reviews.author: anna marie king

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the packaging looked as if it had previously been opened and then sealed again. And there was no handle for the mop.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MOP
customer_reviews.text: All in one moping system. Love this mop! Used it in my office, easy storage, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. She said it is much easier for her to handle then trying to wring out a mop.
customer_reviews.author: rheag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, great if you have a bad back, you can wring out as much moisture as desired depending on if your cleaning hardwood, tile or linoleum
customer_reviews.author: Beth Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Spins very well. Strings are a little longer than previous spin mop which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Wctpw

customer_reviews.title: The best mop
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best mop I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Libman Mop and Bucket Spin Mop & Bucket, White/Green
product_meta.description: Libman spin mop & bucket is an all in one mopping kit with stainless steel spin chamber. The stainless steel mop handle has a locking lever allowing you to adjust the mop length. Control the dampness of the mop by the number of times you push the handle down once for a damp mop or multiple times for a drier mop.
feature_bullets: Push handle down once for a damp map or more times for a drier mop
Locking handle allows mopping at user's preferred length

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars342 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
